name: Box Manager
description:
Created with Godot in 3 hours for Trijam  181.

Mischievous boxes keep appearing on your well-maintained room! Throw them back into their respective pits to teach them a lesson.

Be aware: evil box magic changes the position of the pits every time you throw one of them down! Also you have a limit of 5 seconds per box because also magic or something. Listen just throw the boxes down the holes.

Engine: Godot
Graphics: Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sokoban)
Sound effects: Bfxr
Font: Pixtile (https://www.fontspace.com/pixtile-font-f78063)
